text: int max ( int a , int b ) { return a >= b ? a : b ; } int a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] ; int main ( void ) { int t , n , i , j , k , sum ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; sum = - 1 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) for ( j = 0 ; j < i + 1 ; j ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; if ( n == 1 ) { printf ( "%d\n" , a [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; continue ; } for ( i = 1 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { a [ i ] [ 0 ] += a [ i - 1 ] [ 0 ] ; if ( a [ i ] [ 0 ] > sum ) sum = a [ i ] [ 0 ] ; } for ( i = 1 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 1 ; j < i + 1 ; j ++ ) { if ( i == j ) a [ i ] [ j ] = a [ i - 1 ] [ j - 1 ] + a [ i ] [ j ] ; else a [ i ] [ j ] = max ( a [ i - 1 ] [ j ] , a [ i - 1 ] [ j - 1 ] ) + a [ i ] [ j ] ; if ( a [ i ] [ j ] > sum ) sum = a [ i ] [ j ] ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , sum ) ; } return 0 ; }
